Package com.nrg948.preferences

Class EnumPreference<E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
com.nrg948.preferences.PreferenceValue
com.nrg948.preferences.EnumPreference<E>
public final class EnumPreference<E extends Enum<E>> extends PreferenceValue
A class representing an enum value in the preferences store.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnumPreference

      public EnumPreference(String group, String name, E defaultValue)
      Constructs an instance of this class.
      Parameters:
      group - The preference value's group name. This is usually the subsystem or class that uses the value.
      name - The preferences value name.
      defaultValue - The value supplied when the preference does not exist in the preferences store.

    • select

      public <V> Optional<V> select(Map<E,V> map)
      Selects a value from a map using the current value as the key.
      Type Parameters:
      V - The type of the map's values.
      Parameters:
      map - The map to select from.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the selected value, or an empty Optional if the key does not exist in the map.

    • selectOrDefault

      public <V> V selectOrDefault(Map<E,V> map, V defaultValue)
      Selects a value from a map using the current value as the key, returning a default value if the key does not exist in the map.
      Type Parameters:
      V - The type of the map's values.
      Parameters:
      map - The map to select from.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if the key does not exist in the map.
      Returns:
      The selected value, or the default value if the key does not exist in the map.
